Sensor - Class in sensors
A sensor supporting listeners, encapsulating much of the functionality of the sensors in the package, and should be extended to provide more kinds of sensors.
Sensor(long) - Constructor for class sensors.Sensor
Constructs a new Sensor with the specified sensor ID.
Sensor.SensorEvent - Class in sensors
A class that should be extended by each sensor type with an event for that sensor.
Sensor.SensorEvent() - Constructor for class sensors.Sensor.SensorEvent
 
Sensor.SensorListener - Interface in sensors
An interface that should be extended by each sensor type to include a method they call with their events.
Sensor.Types - Class in sensors
A class (more closely resembles an enum) that describes the various types of sensors implemented so far.
Sensor.Types() - Constructor for class sensors.Sensor.Types
 
sensorId - Variable in class sensors.Sensor
The ID of the sensor.
sensors - package sensors
 
sensors - Static variable in class preY2011.Mecanum.Wiring
 
SensorThread - Class in sensors
A thread that checks all sensors for whether they should fire an event.

Sets the delay after which each sensor checks for changes.
setThreshold(double) - Method in class sensors.AnalogSensor
Sets the threshold for when an event for the sensor should be fired.

SwerveDrive - Class in driveSystems
A class designed to control a Swerve Drive.
SwerveDrive(SpeedController[], double[], Encoder[]) - Constructor for class driveSystems.SwerveDrive
Constructs a swerve drive from the specified motors, motor coefficients and encoders.
SwerveDrive.AngularMovement - Class in driveSystems
An angular movement designed for the motors controlling the direction of the wheels.
SwerveDrive.AngularMovement(double, double, int) - Constructor for class driveSystems.SwerveDrive.AngularMovement
Constructs an angular movement from the specified target angle, delta angle and direction [See description of direction field].
